General.Name: E for L Aim Public Company Limited
General.Description: E for L Aim Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the distribution of medical devices and equipment in Thailand. The company was formerly known as Absolute Impact Public Company Limited and changed its name to E for L Aim Public Company Limited in September 2013. E for L Aim Public Company Limited was incorporated in 2008 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.
